abstract.t: This document is an example template for creating an Internet-Draft in RFC XML v3 format.

section.title: Introduction
section.t: This section introduces the document. You can add paragraphs with <t>.

section.title: Conventions and Terminology
section.t: The key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "SHOULD", "MAY", etc. are to be interpreted as described in [RFC2119].

section.title: Main Content
section.t: Add your specification text here. Use lists:

section.title: IANA Considerations
section.t: This document makes no request of IANA.

section.title: Security Considerations
section.t: All RFCs must contain a section that discusses the security considerations of the protocol or procedures defined.

front.title: Key words for use in RFCs to Indicate Requirement Levels
